qas.question: What times are generally reserved for local newscasts?
When do most other stations view their local newscasts?
When does CBC News Now air?
Consumers have complained that CBC stations tend to fill early evenings with what type of programming?
What popular CBC news program has won awards for their newscasts?
What documentary series did the CBC recently gain rights to in order to increase their ratings?
What weekly newsmagizine has played since the inception of the CBC station?

context: In addition to the mentioned late local newscasts, CBC stations in most markets fill early evenings with <b3_0>local news<b3_0/> programs, generally <a0_0>from 5:00 p.m. to 6:30 p.m.<a0_0/>, while most stations also air a single local newscast on <a1_0>weekend evenings<a1_0/> (comprising a supper hour broadcast on Saturdays and a late evening newscast on Sundays). Other newscasts include parts of <b4_0>CBC News Now<b4_0/> airing <a2_0>weekday at 6:00 a.m. and noon<a2_0/>. Weekly newsmagazine <b6_0>the fifth estate<b6_0/> is also a CBC mainstay, as are documentary series such as <b5_0>Doc Zone<b5_0/>.
